description: Sum of exponents of primes in C(4n,2n)/C(2n,n).
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(v = binomial(4*n, 2*n)/binomial(2*n, n)); bigomega(numerator(v)) - bigomega(denominator(v)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013(PARI) vp(n,p)=my(s);while(n\=p,s+=n);sa(n)=my(s);forprime(p=2,4*n,s+=vp(4*n,p)-3*vp(2*n,p)+2*vp(n,p)); s \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 30 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
